snippet: The reaction to the decision of the referee, Cuneyt Cakir of Turkey, to issue a red card in Manchester United’s loss to Real Madrid was immediate and incredulous. But was it correct?
abstract: The reaction to the decision of the referee, Cuneyt Cakir of Turkey, to issue a red card in Manchester United’s loss to Real Madrid was immediate and incredulous. But was it correct?

headline.main: Seeing Red Over Nani: Was the Referee Right?
